meanings.definition: Heirs: those legally entitled to inherit the property or rank of another upon that person's death.
meanings.sent1: The haeredes of the king were eagerly awaiting their inheritance.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer explained to the family that they were the haeredes of the wealthy uncle.
meanings.sent3: The haeredes threw a party to celebrate their upcoming inheritance.
meanings.sent4: The haeredes were like seeds waiting to sprout into the next generation of leaders.
meanings.sent5: The haeredes were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly into their designated places.

meanings.definition: Inheritors: those who receive property or rank from a deceased person.
meanings.sent1: The haeredes were overjoyed to receive the antique jewelry from their grandmother.
meanings.sent2: The siblings were the haeredes of the family farm after their parents passed away.
meanings.sent3: The haeredes joked about becoming rich overnight thanks to their inheritance.
meanings.sent4: The haeredes were like magnets, attracting wealth and responsibility.
meanings.sent5: The haeredes were like treasure hunters uncovering their long-lost riches.
